cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 280 miles SSW of Apalachicola, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast toward the Florida Big Bend, then forecast to sweep across GA/SC/NC and offshore the Mid-Atlantic
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend (between Suwannee River and Mexico Beach)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Anclote River to Suwannee River FL and west of Mexico Beach to Destin FL.  Tropical Storm Watch: Marineland FL to South Santee River SC.
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning: Suwannee River to Mexico Beach FL.  Tropical Storm Warning: Anclote River to Suwannee River FL and west of Mexico Beach to Destin FL.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Florida Big Bend and Panhandle, then coastal GA, SC, NC and Mid-Atlantic states up to New England.
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤6%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; brief gusts possible.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None – official surge forecast limited to Florida Big Bend eastward.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only scattered showers possible; heavy cores expected well east of Mississippi coast.
